attributes.action: £20 cap on premier league away match tickets for away supporters.
attributes.background: Football fans are being priced out of going to watch their team play away, action is needed to improve atmosphere and fan engagement.

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament don't control the prices for Premier League tickets.

You could ask the Government or Parliament to offer incentives for clubs to reduce the price of tickets - for example, through the tax system.
